description: Strict compliance guidelines for in-flight entertainment (IFE) systems used by commercial airlines worldwide. Airlines serve diverse, captive audiences including families, business travelers, and international passengers.

regional_notes.overview: Airline IFE must be appropriate for all passengers regardless of origin or destination. Content must pass the 'seated next to anyone' test - appropriate if viewed by a child, elderly passenger, different cultures, or religious backgrounds.
regional_notes.major_carriers: Emirates, Qatar Airways, Singapore Airlines, Lufthansa, British Airways, American Airlines, Delta, United use strict IFE guidelines.
regional_notes.editing_standard: Most airlines use pre-edited airline versions of films. These edits are more strict than theatrical or streaming versions.

Kids (G).description: Content for children traveling without headphones being visible to nearby passengers
prohibited: Conflict that could upset young children
restricted: Nothing that could distress a child on a plane
general_requirements: Must be appropriate for confined space viewing
No content that could cause anxiety about flying

Teens (PG-13).description: Teen content with stricter-than-theater standards due to shared viewing environment
general_requirements: Must pass 'seated next to grandmother' test

Adult (R).description: Adult content still heavily edited for airline viewing
prohibited: Air disaster or plane crash content
LGBTQ+ content (for routes to/from Middle East, Asia)
Political content that could offend any nation
restricted: Violence must be reduced from theatrical version
general_requirements: Consider all route destinations in content approval

air_disaster.notes: ABSOLUTELY PROHIBITED. No plane crashes, hijackings, engine failures, turbulence disasters, or anything that could cause passenger anxiety about the flight they are currently on.

terrorism.notes: Prohibited due to security concerns and potential passenger distress. No terrorism themes, plots, or depictions.

violence.notes: Must be significantly reduced from theatrical versions. No blood, gore, or realistic violence. Stylized action may be acceptable.

sexual_content.notes: Nudity is NEVER acceptable on airlines due to shared viewing. Sexual scenes must be cut or heavily edited. Brief kissing only.

profanity.notes: Strong profanity must be muted or dubbed. F-words typically replaced with milder alternatives. On-screen subtitles may also be edited.

alcohol.notes: Ironic since alcohol is served on planes, but drinking should not be central to scenes. Excessive drinking or alcoholism themes avoided.

tobacco.notes: Smoking prohibited in IFE content. Even historical smoking scenes are often cut for airline versions.

drugs.notes: Drug use scenes prohibited. Drug references should be minimized.

religious_political.notes: Must be neutral. Airlines fly passengers of all faiths and political affiliations. Avoid content that mocks or criticizes any religion or government.

cultural_sensitivity.notes: Content viewed on international flights must not offend any culture the airline serves. Middle Eastern routes require additional cuts for modesty and religious content.

platform_specific_rules.airline_edits: All content must use airline-specific edited versions. Studios typically provide these cuts.
platform_specific_rules.route_specific: Some content may be available on certain routes but not others based on destination country regulations
platform_specific_rules.headphone_audio: Mature audio content only available through headphones, not speakers
platform_specific_rules.screen_visibility: Consider that screens are visible to adjacent passengers including children
platform_specific_rules.closed_captions: Subtitles should also be reviewed for profanity and offensive content
platform_specific_rules.thumbnail_review: Movie/show thumbnails and descriptions must also be appropriate

route_considerations.middle_east_routes: Additional cuts for alcohol, LGBTQ+, religious content
route_considerations.us_domestic: Slightly more permissive but still family-friendly standard
